Author: goat, bumped by Franz
Name: Character Data Sync
Description:
This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

In-game, use the configuration menu to choose your main character, the restart the game to start syncing!

Franz would like to not maintain this anymore. Please reach out if you're interested in taking it over.
Punchline: Sync your character data from your main character to all others
